summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Project Finance Control Module (Phase 3). Backend: 16/16 tests passed. Frontend: All features working correctly including project list, detail view, vendor mapping CRUD, search, and financial summary.
passed_tests: GET /api/finance/project-finance - returns list of projects with financial data
GET /api/finance/project-finance with search filter - filters projects correctly
GET /api/finance/project-finance/{project_id} - returns detailed financial view
GET /api/finance/project-finance/{project_id} - returns 404 for invalid project
GET /api/finance/vendor-mappings/{project_id} - returns vendor mappings for project
POST /api/finance/vendor-mappings - creates new vendor mapping
PUT /api/finance/vendor-mappings/{mapping_id} - updates vendor mapping
DELETE /api/finance/vendor-mappings/{mapping_id} - deletes vendor mapping
GET /api/finance/vendor-categories - returns category list (Modular, Non-Modular, Installation, Transport, Other)
POST /api/finance/vendor-mappings - rejects invalid category
POST /api/finance/vendor-mappings - rejects invalid project (404)
PUT /api/finance/vendor-mappings - returns 404 for nonexistent mapping
DELETE /api/finance/vendor-mappings - returns 404 for nonexistent mapping
Vendor mapping locking status correctly reflects spending/production status
Project Finance list page loads at /finance/project-finance
Project Finance list shows summary cards (Projects, Contract Value, Received, Planned Cost, Actual Cost, Over Budget)
Project Finance list shows project cards with financial data
Search functionality filters projects by name/PID/client
Project Finance detail page loads at /finance/project-finance/:projectId
Financial Summary card shows correct values (Contract, Received, Planned, Actual, Remaining Liability, Safe Surplus)
Vendor Mapping table shows all entries with edit/delete buttons
Add Vendor button opens dialog with form fields (Vendor Name, Category, Amount, Notes)
Add Vendor dialog creates mapping and updates totals
Planned vs Actual (By Category) section displays correctly
Recent Transactions section displays correctly
updated_files: /app/tests/test_project_finance.py - Created comprehensive backend tests for Project Finance module
seed_data_creation: Test vendor mapping created and deleted during testing (TEST_Playwright_Vendor)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Project Finance Control module (Phase 3) fully tested. All vendor mapping CRUD operations work correctly. Locking mechanism works - vendor mappings cannot be edited once spending or production starts. Test project 'proj_17942869' (sharan) has 3 vendor mappings totaling â‚¹1,80,000. Financial summary calculations are correct. Search functionality works with debounce. All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing.
